channel.description: The latest CVEs for rustls -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-32650|2024-04-19T19:47:45.579Z -- rustls -- rustls
item.description: Rustls is a modern TLS library written in Rust. `rustls::ConnectionCommon::complete_io` could fall into an infinite loop based on network input. When using a blocking rustls server, if a client send a `close_notify` message immediately after `client_hello`, the server's `complete_io` will get in an infinite loop. This vulnerability is fixed in 0.23.5, 0.22.4, and 0.21.11.
